```{r}

combinations <- c("(1)", "a", "b", "c", "d", "ab", "ac", "ad", "bc", "cd", "bd",
                  "abc", "abd", "acd", "bcd", "abcd")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(322) 

sample(combinations)
```

```{r}
thrower <- c("ab", "kz", "ab", "ab", "kz", "kz")
```

```{r}
results <- map_df(1:16, ~{
  set.seed(.x)
  tibble(
    seed = .x,
    order = list(sample(thrower))
  )
})

results
```
